attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Save Rogate village school West Sussex near Petersfield from closer. This school has an outstanding ofsted report and is a huge benefit to its local community.We support friends that go there as well as standing for our own 2 children who also attend a village school. What is happening to this country and its history. These schools have benfited children for years and should carry on doing so for years to come. Please help supporting these children who are deeply saddened by the threat of closure in 2010. Give our children the love and security that smaller schools offer. From this they will thrive the children are our future. The village life will suffer and the heart of this village will be taken away.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
